text: Amblypterus is an extinct genus of prehistoric bony fish from the Cisuralian. == Classification == === Species === * †Amblypterus arcuatus * †Amblypterus beaumonti * †Amblypterus blainvillei (currently Aeduella blainvillei) * †Amblypterus carolinae * †Amblypterus decorus * †Amblypterus duvernoyi * †Amblypterus latus (type) * †Amblypterus reussi * †Amblypterus stewarti * †Amblypterus traquairi * †Amblypterus voltzi === Type species === The type species is Amblypterus latus. == Synonymy == * Amblypterus blainvillei (Agassiz, 1833) → Aeduella blainvillei (Agassiz, 1833) [= Palaeoniscus blainvillei Agassiz, 1833, Palaeothrissum inaequilobum Blainville, 1818] * Amblypterus eurypterygius Agassiz, 1833 → Rhabdolepis macroptera (Bronn, 1829) * Amblypterus lateralis Agassiz, 1833 → Amblypterus latus Agassiz, 1833 == Related pages == * Prehistoric fish * List of prehistoric bony fish == References == # Fishes of the World by Joseph S. Nelson # A Pictorial Guide to Fossils by Gerard Ramon Case Category:Extinct fish Category:Bony fish
title: Amblypterus
